synopsis.text: Oshino Meme, an eccentric vagrant, helps third-year high school student Koyomi Araragi return to his human form after a brief vampire encounter, leaving him with supernatural abilities. As Araragi tries to lead a normal life, he encounters various girls with supernatural afflictions, such as the weightless Hitagi Senjougahara, the lost spirit Mayoi, and Suruga Kanbaru with her monkey-like arm. With Oshino's guidance, Araragi becomes entangled in the world of gods and spirits as he helps these girls resolve their paranormal issues. Bakemonogatari follows Araragi's thrilling journey through these supernatural tales, as he uncovers the secrets behind each girl's mysterious condition.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
